<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1504|גָּזַר]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גְּזַר‎</span>] **verb** ==cut, (divide,) determine== (so [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Syriac, in both meanings; Biblical Hebrew usually ***divide***, Job, Esther, ***decree***); — 

**Pe**. ***Participle active*** as substantive, plural absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גָָּֽזְרִין‎</span> ***determiners*** (of fate; astrologers or soothsayers) [[Dan.2.27|Dan 2:27]]; [[Dan.5.11|Dan 5:11]] emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גָָּֽזְרַיָּא‎</span> [[Dan.4.4|Dan 4:4]]; [[Dan.5.7|Dan 5:7]] (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]].; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#RS|RS]]<sup>JPhil. xiii (1885), 781</sup>). **Hithpe\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎הִתְגְּזֶרֶת‎</span> [[Dan.2.34|Dan 2:34]] a stone ***was cut out***, so <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אִתְג‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ § 23, 1; 30, 2</sup>) v[[Dan.2.45|Dan 2:45]] (with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִן‎</span> of source).
